mapper.insert: INSERT INTO messages (chat_room_id, sender_id, content, type, client_message_id, sent_at) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{senderId}, #{content}, #{type}::message_type, #{clientMessageId}, #{sentAt})
mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS messageId, m.sender_id AS senderId, u.nickname AS senderNickname, u.profile_image_url AS senderProfileImageUrl, m.content, m.type, m.sent_at AS sentAt, m.client_message_id AS clientMessageId FROM messages m JOIN users u ON m.sender_id = u.id WHERE m.chat_room_id = #{roomId} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM message_deletions md WHERE md.message_id = m.id AND md.user_id = #{userId} ) ORDER BY m.sent_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
